00022 #region Usings
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Collections.Generic;
00025 using System.Text;
00026 using System.Xml;
00027 #endregion
00028 
00029 namespace Utilities.FileFormats.APMLHelper
00030 {
00034     public class Source
00035     {
00036         #region Constructors
00037 
00038 
00039 
00040         public Source()
00041         {
00042         }
00043 
00048         public Source(XmlElement Element)
00049         {
00050             if (Element.Name.Equals("source", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00051             {
00052                 if (Element.Attributes["key"] != null)
00053                 {
00054                     Key = Element.Attributes["key"].Value;
00055                 }
00056                 if (Element.Attributes["value"] != null)
00057                 {
00058                     Value = float.Parse(Element.Attributes["value"].Value);
00059                 }
00060                 if (Element.Attributes["from"] != null)
00061                 {
00062                     From = Element.Attributes["from"].Value;
00063                 }
00064                 if (Element.Attributes["updated"] != null)
00065                 {
00066                     Updated = DateTime.Parse(Element.Attributes["updated"].Value);
00067                 }
00068                 if (Element.Attributes["type"] != null)
00069                 {
00070                     Type = Element.Attributes["type"].Value;
00071                 }
00072                 if (Element.Attributes["name"] != null)
00073                 {
00074                     Name = Element.Attributes["name"].Value;
00075                 }
00076                 foreach (XmlNode Child in Element.ChildNodes)
00077                 {
00078                     try
00079                     {
00080                         if (Child.Name.Equals("author", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00081                         {
00082                             Authors.Add(new Author((XmlElement)Child));
00083                         }
00084                     }
00085                     catch { }
00086                 }
00087             }
00088         }
00089         #endregion
00090 
00091         #region Properties
00092 
00093 
00094 
00095         public string Key
00096         {
00097             get { return _Key; }
00098             set { _Key = value; }
00099         }
00100         private string _Key = "";
00101 
00105         public string Name
00106         {
00107             get { return _Name; }
00108             set { _Name = value; }
00109         }
00110         private string _Name = "";
00111 
00115         public float Value
00116         {
00117             get { return _Value; }
00118             set { _Value = value; }
00119         }
00120         private float _Value = 1.0f;
00121 
00125         public string Type
00126         {
00127             get { return _Type; }
00128             set { _Type = value; }
00129         }
00130         private string _Type = "";
00131 
00135         public string From
00136         {
00137             get { return _From; }
00138             set { _From = value; }
00139         }
00140         private string _From = "";
00141 
00145         public DateTime Updated
00146         {
00147             get { return _Updated; }
00148             set { _Updated = value; }
00149         }
00150         private DateTime _Updated = DateTime.Now;
00151 
00155         public List<Author> Authors
00156         {
00157             get { return _Authors; }
00158             set { _Authors = value; }
00159         }
00160         private List<Author> _Authors = new List<Author>();
00161         #endregion
00162 
00163         #region Overridden Functions
00164         public override string ToString()
00165         {
00166             StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00167             if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(From))
00168             {
00169                 Builder.Append("<Source key=\"" + Key + "\" name=\"" + Name + "\" value=\"" + Value + "\" type=\"" + Type + "\" from=\"" + From + "\" updated=\"" + Updated.ToString("yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ") + "\">");
00170             }
00171             else
00172             {
00173                 Builder.Append("<Source key=\"" + Key + "\" name=\"" + Name + "\" value=\"" + Value + "\" type=\"" + Type + "\">");
00174             }
00175             foreach (Author Author in Authors)
00176             {
00177                 Builder.Append(Author.ToString());
00178             }
00179             Builder.Append("</Source>");
00180             return Builder.ToString();
00181         }
00182         #endregion
00183     }
